dict.acceptation: 学生；[解]瞳孔；未成年人；[法]被监护人；

sent.orig: And then we have the other English word pupil, the pupil of your eye.
sent.trans: 然后我们有其他英文单词学生，学生的眼睛。

sent.orig: Pupil normal round pupil, both big and so on.
sent.trans: 瞳孔正常瞳孔为圆形，双侧等大。

sent.orig: A larger pupil indicates a positive response, whereas a constricted pupil a less than favorable reaction.
sent.trans: 大的瞳孔表明正面的反应，而狭小的瞳孔暗示不太赞同。

sent.orig: The real focus position is much affected by the size of incident pupil.
sent.trans: 同时实际焦点位置与入瞳大小紧密相关。

sent.orig: What time do those pupil do morning exercises each day?
sent.trans: 那些小学生每天几点做早操？
